rationale: Team A has incredible QB depth with Dak Prescott and Caleb Williams ready to step in. This trade leverages the league's top QB, Josh Allen, to acquire the undisputed #1 RB in Christian McCaffrey and an elite, high-floor TE in Travis Kelce. This move transforms Team A by filling its two biggest needs with top-tier talent, significantly increasing the team's total projected score and creating a championship-caliber lineup.
